short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: X analytics tool that helps you stay consistent and grow your audience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Would you like a sneak peek at the key analytics stats for your Twitter/X account? With Ugly Duckling extension for Chrome, you always have them at your fingertips.

Features:
• Consistency Chart
• Charts of new followers and posts
• Weekly goals
• Leaderboard and public URL to your profile

Ugly Duckling is available as a web application on the internet (https://uglyduckling.app) and as a Chrome extension.
